name: Localise
description:
This game will be submitted as part of Staffordshire University's Collaborative Game Development Module.

Controls
--------------

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Space - Spin Attack

Mouse Move - Camera Movement

Right Click - Planet Circumspection

Collect the essentials to activate the portal to the next level! (Currently levels beyond the first serve more as artistic demonstrations than anything else)

Note: the game currently interacts strangely with multiscreen setups. You may need to additionally (left) click for your mouse movement to be considered.

Sharepoint link for Staffordshire Uni Students:
VerticalSlice.zip
